About
About Us
About SOMI Art Fest
In 1984 a dedicated group of Red Sunset Merchants Association members conceived an arts and crafts festival as a way to bring shoppers into the area and to serve the community by bringing the arts closer to the local population. Starting as a small show with only 25 booths, it has grown to over 150 vendors spanning all four blocks of downtown South Miami.
Recently named a Sunshine Artist 200 Best Show in America 2018, having already achieved the ArtFairSourceBook.com to the AFSB Blue Chip 100 Fine Art Event, it is clearly one of Miami-Dade’s most anticipated events.
The festival is now wholly produced by the dedicated volunteers of the Rotary Club of South Miami and its South Miami Rotary Foundation, Inc. Our artists come from all over the United States and Canada. Over the years the show has engaged local musicians to play during this juried event.
South Miami Rotary Foundation, Inc is a 501c3 that funds college scholarships for South Miami students, as well as other local, national, and international service projects.
About
Frequently Asked Questions
When is SOMI Art Fest?
The festival is held every year the weekend after Presidents’ Day. Our next festival is February 21 and 22, 2026.
Where is the festival located?
The festival is located in the downtown area of South Miami on Sunset Drive (SW 72nd Street) from US 1 to Red Road (SW 57th Avenue.)

For Artists
Applications are now open!
Apply Now
Artists
Our  Festival
The SOMI Art Fest is a juried Art show that takes place in the heart of downtown South Miami
The festival’s reputation for museum-caliber art and high-quality fine craft along with its picturesque location and luxurious venue amenities attracts artists from across the country and around the world each year. More than 20,000 festival-goers attend this 2-day event
Artists can expect a pristine venue with paved walkways leading to tree-shaded booths on the grass; complimentary artist hospitality; easy check-in and set-up; express checkout; convenient free parking; finely appointed on-site restrooms; 24-hour security; and a cultivated attendance by art-enthusiasts, serious buyers and collectors.
SOMI Art Fest has been ranked as one of the Top 200 Best Art Shows in the country by Sunshine Artist. South Miami is located 10 miles from Miami International Airport and is a half-hour drive to Miami Beach.
Prizes
$5,000 total will be awarded to our winners. Judging takes place on the first day of the festival, Professional art jurors will determine the winners. Prize awards are as follows:
Best in Show: $1,750
Second in Show: $1,150
Third in Show: $850
Artist of Note: $450
Applications
Applications are submitted through Zapplications.
Applications Open: June 19
Application Deadline: Nov. 14
Application Fee: $35
Apply Now
Event Information
Location:
The festival is located in the heart of downtown South Miami, adjacent to the Shops at Sunset Place
Dates:
Feb. 21 & 22, 2026
Hours:
Saturday, Feb. 21, 10 a.m. - 6 p.m. and Sunday, Feb. 22, 10 a.m. - 5 p.m.
Jam Session:
Saturday 6 p.m. - 8 p.m.
Admissions:
Our festival is free and open to the public
Parking:
Ample public parking is available both on-street and in garages. We encourage visitors to carpool or take public transportation if possible
Transit:
Take the Metrorail to South Miami Station

Become a Sponsor
Sponsorship Opportunities
Interested in becoming a Sponsor?
We are thrilled to have the support of generous sponsors who make our festival possible. Their contributions help us to create a vibrant, engaging, and accessible event that celebrates the arts and enriches the community.
We would like to extend a heartfelt thank you to our sponsors who have already committed to supporting our festival. Your investment in our event will enable us to provide high-quality art exhibitions, installations, performances, and activities that will delight and inspire festival-goers of all ages.
By partnering with us as a sponsor, you will not only have the opportunity to support the arts in our community but also to raise the profile of your brand and engage with a diverse audience of art lovers and culture enthusiasts.
Increased brand recognition and exposure to a wide audience
Positive brand association with a high-profile cultural event
Opportunities for on-site activation and product placement
Recognition and visibility on our website, social media, and other promotional materials
We offer a range of sponsorship levels to fit your budget and goals, from individual contributions to corporate partnerships. If you are interested in becoming a sponsor for our upcoming festival, please contact us at info@somiartfest.org to learn more about the opportunities available.
Thank you for considering sponsoring our art festival. With your support, we can continue to grow and expand this important community event, providing a platform for artists and cultural organizations to showcase their work and engage with audiences in meaningful ways.
Contact Us
